00024 #include "SHA1_ostream.hpp"
00025 #include "unit.hpp"
00026 #include "boost/iostreams/flush.hpp"
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/operations.hpp>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <sstream>
00030 #include <fstream>
00031 
00032 
00033 using namespace pwiz::util;
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 
00037 ostream* os_ = 0;
00038 
00039 
00040 const char* textBrown_ = "The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog";
00041 const char* hashBrown_ = "2fd4e1c67a2d28fced849ee1bb76e7391b93eb12";
00042 
00043 
00044 void test()
00045 {
00046     ostringstream oss;
00047     SHA1_ostream sha1os(oss);
00048 
00049     sha1os << textBrown_ << flush;
00050     string hash = sha1os.hash();
00051     sha1os.explicitFlush();
00052 
00053     if (os_) *os_ << "str: " << oss.str() << endl
00054                   << "hash: " << hash << endl;
00055 
00056     unit_assert(hash == hashBrown_);
00057     unit_assert(sha1os.hash() == hashBrown_);
00058 
00059     sha1os << textBrown_ << flush;
00060     sha1os.explicitFlush();
00061 
00062     hash = sha1os.hash();
00063    
00064     if (os_) *os_ << "str: " << oss.str() << endl
00065                   << "hash: " << hash << endl;
00066 
00067     string hash2 = SHA1Calculator::hash(string(textBrown_) + textBrown_);
00068     unit_assert(sha1os.hash() == hash2);
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 void testFile()
00073 {
00074     string filename = "SHA1_ostream.temp.txt";
00075     ofstream ofs(filename.c_str(), ios::binary); // binary necessary on Windows to avoid \n -> \r\n translation     
00076     SHA1_ostream sha1os(ofs);
00077 
00078     sha1os << textBrown_ << '\n' << textBrown_ << flush;
00079     string hashStream = sha1os.hash();
00080 
00081     sha1os.explicitFlush();
00082     string hashFile = SHA1Calculator::hashFile(filename);
00083 
00084     if (os_) *os_ << "stream: " << hashStream << endl
00085                   << "file  : " << hashFile << endl; 
00086 
00087     unit_assert(hashStream == hashFile);
00088     unit_assert(hashStream == "a159e6cde4e50e51713700d1fe4d0ce553eace87");
00089     ofs.close();
00090     boost::filesystem::remove(filename);
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00095 {
00096     try
00097     {
00098         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00099         test();
00100         testFile();
00101         return 0;
00102     }
00103     catch (exception& e)
00104     {
00105         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00106     }
00107     catch (...)
00108     {
00109         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00110     }
00111 
00112     return 1;
00113 }
